mapper.select:
select a.id,a.process_name,a.company_id,a.project_id,a.task_manage_id, group_concat(b.id) as node_id,b.process_id,group_concat(b.node_name order by b.seq)AS node_name,b.seq,b.company_user_id,c.user_name from maoding_web_project_process a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project p on a.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_process_node b on a.id = b.process_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user c on b.company_user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task_manager d on a.task_manage_id = d.id where p.pstatus='0' and b.company_user_id = #{companyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.status='0' and d.status='0' GROUP BY a.id ORDER BY d.create_date DESC , a.project_id
LIMIT #{startPage},#{endPage}

select m.project_name,a.id,a.process_name,a.company_id,a.project_id,a.task_manage_id, group_concat(b.id) as node_id,b.process_id,group_concat(b.node_name)AS node_name,b.seq,b.company_user_id,c.user_name from maoding_web_project_process a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_process_node b on a.id = b.process_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user c on b.company_user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project m on a.project_id = m.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task_manager d on a.task_manage_id = d.id where b.company_user_id = #{companyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.status='0' and d.status='0' GROUP BY a.project_id ORDER BY a.project_id

SELECT COUNT(1) from ( select a.id from maoding_web_project_process a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project p on a.project_id = p.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_process_node b on a.id = b.process_id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user c on b.company_user_id = c.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task_manager d on a.task_manage_id = d.id where p.pstatus='0' and b.company_user_id = #{companyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.status='0' and d.status='0' GROUP BY a.id ) d

select a.id as node_id,a.node_name,a.company_user_id,d.user_name,d.user_id,d.email,e.cellphone,e.user_name as account_name, CONCAT(#{fastdfsUrl,jdbcType=VARCHAR},f.file_group,'/',f.attach_path) as imgUrl from maoding_web_project_process_node a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_process b on a.process_id = b.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task c on b.task_manage_id = c.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_company_user d on a.company_user_id = d.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_account e on d.user_id = e.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_user_attach f on e.id = f.user_id and f.attach_type=5 where c.project_id=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.task_status='0' and b.status='0' GROUP by node_name,company_user_id ORDER by a.seq,a.node_seq

select a.node_name as title, GROUP_CONCAT(c.task_name) as content from maoding_web_project_process_node a LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_process b on a.process_id = b.id LEFT JOIN maoding_web_project_task c on b.task_manage_id = c.id where c.project_id=#{projectId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.company_id=#{companyId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and a.company_user_id=#{companyUserId,jdbcType=VARCHAR} and c.task_status='0' and b.status='0' GROUP by node_name ORDER by a.seq,a.node_seq
